website_summaries.verdict: This handy cookbook stand easily folds flat for simple storage when you want it out of view.
pros: When folded in half, the storage width is less than an inch
Blends in nicely with other book spines when you want to hide from guests
Holds larger books despite its slim design
cons: Cookbook pages may fall out due to the immovable page holders

customer_reviews.title: Has a great personality, though!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! It folds easily into a slim package to fit on the shelf with my cookbooks, and can handle even my heaviest cookbooks without a problem. The angle of the cookbook stand is also perfect for my husband and me (I'm about 5'-7", he's 6'-0"), and saves my back the pain of having to lean over to read a cookbook (as I had to before Joseph Joseph brought this wonderful gadget into my life). It might not be the most attractive option out there, but its efficient space-saving storability and easy foldability mean it's found a place in my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Meganasaurus

Page-hold-down arms are lightly spring-loaded so can be pushed down out of the way when turning pages. Since it conveniently stores with our other cookbooks and is so easy to open/close with no hassle we take it out every time a recipe is followed now and put it away again as soon as we're done.

product_meta.title: Joseph Joseph Cookbook and Tablet Stand Holder Reading Rest Folds Flat with Page Holder, White
product_meta.description:
This Joseph Joseph Cookbook Stand opens and folds flat like a book to ¾ inch thick, so you can store it on your bookshelf. It includes book rests, page holders, and a back stand for open angled viewing. This book stand provides support for most sizes of books and tablets and has non-slip feet to ensure it stays in place as you read your recipes. It folds flat for an easy and efficient storage solution and is dishwasher safe, making clean up a breeze. It features a white ABS plastic construction and durable exterior design to withstand years of use. Open: 15 x 8.25 x 8.25 inches, Closed: 10.25 x 7.75 x .75 inches

BRAND STORY
By Joseph Joseph

Provides solid, angled support for most sizes of books and tablets
Tough, stylish, and compact cookbook stand made from quality ABS plastic; dishwasher-safe
